name: Nina
description: A gamer with really poor grades. She is passionate, impulsive and hates to lose, and becomes unreasonable when she loses her temper. She finds fighting Nightmares similar to her games - challenging and fun!

passiveSkill.name: Game Master
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Every time Nina damages an enemy, increases this attack's DMG Rate by {placeholder} and CRIT Power by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Fate Breaker
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "May the flames guide you. Nina attacks an enemy column and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. For each target hit, increases CRIT Rate by {placeholder} ."}

specialSkill.name: Heavenly Pierce
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Praise the sun! Nina attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing CRIT Rate by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Death Beam
normalSkill.description: Nina thrusts her lance forward. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: May the flames guide you. Nina attacks an enemy column and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. For each target hit, increases CRIT Rate by {placeholder} .
templateData.lens5.skill: Every time Nina damages an enemy, increases this attack's DMG Rate by {placeholder} and CRIT Power by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Praise the sun! Nina attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing CRIT Rate by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
